```{r}

# Read data
rawdata <- read.csv(file=paste(di, "/data/raw_iv.csv", sep= ""), header = TRUE, sep = ',')

# Create variables of year and month 
# Apply scale factor https://lpdaac.usgs.gov/dataset_discovery/modis/modis_products_table/mod13q1 
rawdata <- rawdata %>% 
  mutate(myevi = evi * 0.0001,
         year = lubridate::year(fecha),
         month = lubridate::month(fecha))



#------------------------ test
# Pixels with negative evi values?
# Pixels with positive evi values?
rawdata %>% 
  summarise(pixel_pos=sum(myevi >= 0),
            pixel_neg=sum(myevi < 0),
            pixels=n())
#------------------------ End test


# Prepare data
# Get coordinates and pob 
evi_aux <- rawdata %>% select(iv_malla_modi_id, lng, lat, poblacion) %>%
  group_by(iv_malla_modi_id) %>% unique()


# Join dataframes 
evi <- evi %>% inner_join(evi_aux, by="iv_malla_modi_id") 

```

# Explore EVI mean 

```{r}
ggplot(evi, aes(x=year, y=evi_mean, group=year)) + geom_boxplot() + facet_wrap(~poblacion)


# Create mean values by pob and year
mydf <- evi %>% 
  select(year, poblacion, evi_mean_all) %>%
  group_by(year, poblacion) %>% 
  summarise(media = mean(evi_mean_all), 
            sd = sd(evi_mean_all), 
            se = sd(evi_mean_all) / sqrt(length(evi_mean_all))) 
                                         
  

ggplot(mydf, aes(x=year, y=media, group=year)) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=media - sd, ymax= media + sd)) +
  facet_wrap(~poblacion) + 
  geom_line(aes(group=1))



# dr = 2005, 2006 
# pre = 2000 - 2004 
# post = 2006 - 2010 

# Resistance 
# rt = dr / pre 
# Recovery 
# rc = post / dr 
# Resilience 
# rs = post /pre 


df <- evi %>%
  mutate(myperiod = ifelse(year %in% c(2003,2004), 
                         'pre', 
                         ifelse( 
                           year %in% c(2005), 
                           'dr',
                           ifelse(
                             year %in% c(2006,2007), 
                             'post', 'out'))))

df <- df %>% filter(myperiod != 'out') %>%
  select(iv_malla_modi_id, poblacion, evi_mean_all, myperiod) %>%
  group_by(iv_malla_modi_id, myperiod) %>% 
  summarise(media = mean(evi_mean_all))


# long to wide 
library(reshape2)
df_aux <- dcast(df, iv_malla_modi_id ~ myperiod, value.var = 'media')

# Resistance rt = dr / pre 
# Recoveryrc = post / dr 
# Resilience rs = post /pre 



df_aux <- df_aux %>% 
  mutate(rt = dr / pre,
         rc = post / dr,
         rs = post / pre) %>% 
  inner_join(evi_aux, by="iv_malla_modi_id") 


ggplot(df_aux, aes(x=year, y=evi_mean, group=year)) + geom_boxplot() + facet_wrap(~poblacion)










# PCA
```{r}
# Get 
# Select variables and mean value
df_pca_evi <- evi %>% 
  select(iv_malla_modi_id, poblacion, evi_mean, evi_min, evi_max, jd_min, jd_max, evi_cv) %>%
  group_by(iv_malla_modi_id) %>%
  summarise_each(funs(mean(.))) %>% 
  filter(poblacion != 9) %>% 
  mutate(pop_group=ifelse(poblacion < 2, 'A', 
                          ifelse(poblacion < 6, 'B', 'C')))


df_pca_evi <- as.data.frame(df_pca_evi[c(9,1:8)])


# PCA evi 
pca_evi <- prcomp(df_pca_evi[,-c(1:3)], scale=TRUE)

# Eigenvalues 
# Los eigenvalues es sd^2 
ev <- (pca_evi$sdev)^2


# Obtener tabla de importancia de los ejes
summary(pca_evi)


## 
# Plot 
colores <- c("black", "red", "green3", "blue","cyan", "magenta", "yellow", "gray")
library("pca3d")
pca3d(pca_evi, group = df_pca_evi[,"poblacion"], 
      palette =colores, show.ellipses=TRUE,
      ellipse.ci=0.75, show.plane=TRUE)

pca2d(pca_evi, group = df_pca_evi[,"poblacion"], components = c(1,2),
      show.ellipses=TRUE, ellipse.ci=0.75, palette =colores)

, show.ellipses=TRUE,

## Second approach 

Use several attributes of EVI and not the EFTs classification (after Domingo meeting). See Dionisio et al. 

```{r}

u <- evi %>% group_by(year) %>%
  mutate(q_evi_mean=ntile(evi_mean, 4),
         q_evi_cv=ntile(evi_cv, 4),
         n=n(), 
         jday=lubridate::yday(date_max)) %>%
  select(iv_malla_modi_id, year, q_evi_mean, q_evi_cv, n, date_max, jday) %>% 
  mutate(q_max = ifelse(jday > 81 & jday <= 173, 1,
                        ifelse(jday > 173 & jday <= 265, 2, 
                               ifelse(jday > 265 & jday <= 356, 3, 4))))
